title: Audio output selection
body: long time league player here, just wondering why this game is yet to have audio output option??? seems so outdated especially for 2018..every game gives you the option of sound output device, i would love to have youtube beats cranking while i play league through headphones...please update this small outdated feature

replies.body: I can adjust sound levels and have music play while I LoL. What is the issue?

you cannot have music through speakers and LoL in headphones that is the problem, I don't  want my music that the whole block can hear, also hear every time I die or lose a match....haha no but really I don't want league that loud through speakers while playing music.. as OP states very outdated to not have this feature
